short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the title and URL of the current page to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension to copy title of the current tab together with the link.
The details are copied in multiple formats so that it works best regardless of which application you post it.

You can either click on the extension button to copy the details or use a shortcut. You can configure the shortcut on the extension shortcuts page: chrome://extensions/shortcuts
